text: Carloforte (italian: comune) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 6,215 people lived there. Its area is 51.1 kmÂ². It is 10 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Carloforte
